elements.name: Verify API: getPatternCount API return Total Pattern Count

steps.name: "System_Admin" User invoke "getPatternCount"
User calls "getPatternCount" API with "Get" http Request
Verify Pattern_Count result is greater than or equal to 0
The API call is success with StatusCode 200

elements.name: Verify API: createPattern API add Pattern paylod

steps.name: "System_Admin" User "Add" Pattern Payload with Param = "none"
User calls "createPattern" API with "Post" http Request
The API call is success with StatusCode 200
Verify response will return Pattern instance
Verify Total Pattern_Count increased by 1

elements.name: Verify API: createPattern API with no pattern Body

steps.name: "System_Admin" User "Add" Pattern Payload  with no Pattern Body and Param = "none"
User calls "createPattern" API with "Post" http Request
The API call is success with StatusCode 400

"message" in response body is "Required request body is missing: public com.ibm.dc.pattern.entity.Pattern com.ibm.dc.pattern.controller.PatternController.createPattern(java.lang.String,com.ibm.dc.pattern.entity.Pattern)"

arguments.val: "Required request body is missing: public com.ibm.dc.pattern.entity.Pattern com.ibm.dc.pattern.controller.PatternController.createPattern(java.lang.String,com.ibm.dc.pattern.entity.Pattern)"

elements.name: Verify API: getAllPatterns API return List of All Pattern

steps.name: "System_Admin" User invoke "getAllPatterns"
User calls "getAllPatterns" API with "Get" http Request
The API call is success with StatusCode 200
Verify response will return List of Pattern
Total number of Pattern in List is equal to getPatternCount

elements.name: Verify API: getPatternBySearchCriteria API, search no SearchCriteria

steps.name: "System_Admin" User invoke "getPatternBySearchCriteria"
User calls "getPatternBySearchCriteria" API with "Get" http Request
The API call is success with StatusCode 200
Verify response will return List of Pattern
All Pattern should have Active Status

elements.name: Verify API: getPatternBySearchCriteria API, search by 'patternId'

steps.name: "System_Admin" User invoke getPatternBySearchCriteria with Parameter: "patternId"
User calls "getPatternBySearchCriteria" API with "Get" http Request
The API call is success with StatusCode 200
Verify response will return List of Pattern
Response should be list of Pattern and size should be one

elements.name: Verify API: getPatternBySearchCriteria API, search by 'patternName'

steps.name: "System_Admin" User invoke getPatternBySearchCriteria with Parameter: "patternName"
User calls "getPatternBySearchCriteria" API with "Get" http Request
The API call is success with StatusCode 200
Verify response will return List of Pattern
Each Pattern of returned PatternList should have same pattern "PatternName"

elements.name: Verify API: deletePattern update Pattern status as Passive

steps.name: "System_Admin" User invoke deletePattern with Parameter: "patternId"
User calls "deletePattern" API with "Delete" http Request
The API call is success with StatusCode 200
Verify response will return Pattern instance
"patternStatus" in response body is "Passive"

elements.name: Verify API: deletePattern API,  with invalid patternId

steps.name: "System_Admin" User invoke "deletePattern" with invalid Parameter: "patternId" = "-9"
User calls "deletePattern" API with "Delete" http Request
The API call is success with StatusCode 500
"message" in response body is "Pattern with id - -9 not found"

elements.name: Verify API: deletePattern API, with no Param

steps.name: "System_Admin" User "deletePattern" with no Param
User calls "deletePattern" API with "Delete" http Request
The API call is success with StatusCode 400
"message" in response body is "Required Integer parameter 'patternId' is not present"

elements.name: Verify API: updatePattern API add Pattern paylod

steps.name: "System_Admin" User "Update" Pattern Payload with Param = "patternId"
User calls "updatePattern" API with "Put" http Request
The API call is success with StatusCode 200
